text:
Company: Long-Hernandez  
Role: Computer Hardware Engineer  

Job Description:  
Long-Hernandez is a leading tech company dedicated to innovative hardware solutions. We are seeking a Computer Hardware Engineer to join our team and contribute to groundbreaking projects. This role involves designing and testing computer components, ensuring high performance and reliability.

Responsibilities:  
- Design and develop computer hardware components.
- Conduct thorough testing and validation of hardware.
- Collaborate with software engineers to enhance system performance.
- Document designs and test results.
- Provide technical support and troubleshooting.

Qualifications and Experience:  
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field.
- Proven experience in computer hardware design and development.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

Perks and Benefits:  
- Comprehensive health insurance, including dental and vision.
- Flexible work hours and remote work options.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $70,000 to $100,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Inclusive workplace environment.

Join our inclusive workplace – we are actively seeking candidates with disabilities. Applicants with disabilities are encouraged to apply to support our diversity initiatives. Help us achieve our diversity objectives by applying – we are interested in candidates with disabilities. Our commitment to inclusion includes welcoming applications from those with disabilities. We aim to foster an inclusive environment and encourage applications from people with disabilities.
